name: Maggie's Favorite Oatmeal Cookies
description: These cookies are chewy, spicy, and complex. Be sure not to overbake them—they'll harden a bit as they cool.
recipeIngredient: Optional: 1/2 cup walnuts or pecans, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter and both sugars together in an electric mixer and mix at medium-high speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl occasionally. Mix until lighter and color and texture, about 4 minutes.

Add salt, eggs, vanilla, cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, baking soda, and cocoa powder, and mix until well incorporated. Fold in oats and flour, then add raisins and nuts if using. Cover and chill at least 1 hour.

Preheat oven to 325°F. Form dough into small balls and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheet. Bake each batch 10 to 12 minutes, let cool on cookie sheet 1 minute before placing on a rack to cool completely.
